page.title: 03THE VICAR OF ST. MARK'S.
page.content: { The Reverend Trevor Park B.A., S.Th. is the present vicar of this parish. He came on the 26th October 1984. He was invited by the patron of Kendal to be the vicar here. His first reaction was one of feeling very welcome. In January of this year Mr. Park began a {Young Christians group}by sending letters to young people who had recently been confirmed, inviting them to{the Vicarage}to meet as a group. Reverend Park joins in with their activities. In addition to learning more about God, the{Young Christians}enjoy playing outdoor sports and going on trips. Mr. Park thinks it is important for young Christians to meet together for a variety of activities.
